subject: Bicycle Motocross
Automobile Racing
organizations: National Assn of Stock Car Auto Racing
lead_paragraph: When Ricky Carmichael, a 15-time American Motorcyclist Association national champion, became just another hopeful driver. But he is making nice progress in his new career.
snippet: When Ricky Carmichael, a 15-time American Motorcyclist Association national champion, became just another hopeful driver. But he is making nice progress in his new career.
